title:
$\sigma$-matching and interchangeable structures on certain associative
  algebras
abstract:
We describe $\sigma$-matching, interchangeable and, as a consequence, totally
compatible products on some classes of associative algebras, including unital
algebras, the semigroup algebras of rectangular bands, algebras with enough
idempotents, free non-unital associative algebras and free non-unital
commutative associative algebras.
